<title level="1" right="Rules">[Sustaining Spells](/Rules.aspx?ID=2243)</title>

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 302 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
If the spell’s duration is “sustained,” it lasts until the end of your next turn unless you use the Sustain action (page 419) on that turn to extend the duration of that spell.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
